name: Dy22w01
description:
I started a challenge by myself to do game design in small weekly chunks. This was the first prototype to practice indirect control and try out Modular Lost Ruins Kit from Epic Games Marketplace.

No winning condition in the game. Goal is to 1. Find ruins. 2. Explore the ruins.

Key bindings:

  • WASD - movement
  • Space - jump
  • Esc - Quit game

Done in Unreal 4.27. Spent 8h.
